title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6150.5 - List of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6150.5 - List of records

State Regulations

On behalf of DCJS, the records access officer shall
maintain and make available for public inspection and copying a current list, by subject matter, of the types of records produced, filed, or first kept by
DCJS whether or not available under this act. Such lists shall be in conformity
with such regulations as may be promulgated by the State Committee on Public

Access to Records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6150.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
